latex: Ethan stayed up until 11:50 PM doing his geography homework. Despite his sleep deprivation, Ethan decides to write problems for SMC Individual. He has a $\frac{2}{3}$ probability of writing a bad problem, and a $\frac{1}{3}$ probability of writing a good problem. The quality of each problem is not affected by the quality of any other problem. Let $p$ be the probability that exactly two out of the three problems he writes are good problems. What is $27p?$
